message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point, considering its worth. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to pay closer to $12,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I understand your desired price point, the value of this product is considerably higher. I could meet you halfway at $13,000.  This is my final offer.
